name: Low Power Radio Association
goal:
LPRA is the voice of Short range Devices industry. LPRA represents SMEs as well as bigger companies in the fields of metering, RFID, medical devices, smart homes & buildings, data network acquisition, security alarms and energy.
LPRA is promoting the voice of our members in ETSI committees. LPRA has a LoU with CEPT allowing to represent industry at Electronic Communication Committee (ECC) and in European Commission for Post and Telecom (CEPT). LPRA is participating to WG FM, SRD-MG and SE24 activity.
interests: Business and Industry, Fraud prevention, Single market
euInitiatives:
Radio Equipment Directive RE-D
ElectroMagnetic Directive EMC-D
ICT standardisation program
